document_data.name: Conyberry Mead
document_data.mainbody: '''Conyberry mead''' was a sweet alcoholic beverage flavored with [[fruit]], [[honey]], and [[spices]] that was brewed in the town of [[Conyberry]] on the edge of the [[Neverwinter Wood]].
document_data.Powers: Conyberry [[mead]] was known to have beneficial effect on imbiber's perception.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], Conyberry mead was sold by the [[Tarmalune Trade House]] in [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
